title: France beat Portugal in tense Euro 2000 semi-final
body_text:
Zinedine Zidane scores golden goal as France beat Portugal at Euro 2000
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Ahead of their Euro 2024 quarter-final clash in Hamburg, BBC Sport looks back to a tense semi-final between the then world champions France and Portugal at Euro 2000.
Watch live coverage of Portugal v France on Friday 5 July at 19:20 BST on BBC One and iPlayer.
Available to UK users only.
